snippet: Steve Santini will end the year in Sweden playing for his second world championship medal in eight months, a point of pride for his New York hockey family.
lead_paragraph: Steve Santini will end the year in Sweden playing for his second world championship medal in eight months, a point of pride for his New York hockey family.

headline.main: For Santini Family, a Memorable Year of Hockey
headline.print_headline: For Santini Family, a Memorable Year of Hockey
